channel.title: Updates on this site?
channel.description:
Waddup. I haven't been around this scene for a while. Just after a few answers.
When I left people had just began using an emulator for the 508 client... And 317 based servers were running rampant. The community was showing no signs of ever improving.. was I right? l0l
Anyone heard from God of Ikiliki? His community was just opening/becoming active when I left.
What ever happened to old members, such as Thug-life?
There were a few others but I can't remember at this time, so I'll just update when I do. l0l

item.title: Updates on this site?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:66, topic:439402”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=542095.msg3974394#msg3974394 date=1334494852]
Most of the legends stay on MITB from what I have noticed unless there is something actually interesting posted in general/announcement area they don’t come here often.
[/quote]

No they just come troll the general/announcement sections when they find a good topic to troll in.[/quote]pretty much what I said xD

Read full topic

item.title: Updates on this site?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

eh irc and rsc section, none of your posts in the rsc section were beneficial nor was the chats on irc… but somehow you managed to come up with a legitimate conversation every now and again. Point is, glad to see you still lurking, mopar needs more old timers.

I was never interested in RSC cheating, I just used to post in there trolling bad Java code posted.

From what I gathered, you’re an old member too, nice to see you’re still around.

Read full topic

item.title: Updates on this site?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I see a sign of improvement… Yz85Racer appears to have matured.

Perhaps. I’m now older, and have had a pretty serious dose of the outside world. Let’s be honest, it’s completely normal to act immature on the internet - who gives a fuck. I was very immature at one point sure, but I’ve now grown up a bit.

Might I ask how I know you/knew you?

Read full topic

item.title: Updates on this site?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I joined
Hybrid pvp came along
Quality of servers has dropped dramatically
InsidiaX was released
Quality dropped more
InsainityX was released
Servers are getting even worse
Tree made a shitty guide to getting women
The end

Read full topic

item.title: Updates on this site?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:47, topic:439402”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=542095.msg3972474#msg3972474 date=1334286846]
God of Ikiliki, aka Skittles Killer, aka RuneDopusCreator created a place where even the worst of the worst of worst idiots could fit in. Ironically it’s where I came from.

r-s was created by a money hungry midget who’s communitys foundation is as cracked as silabs meth pipe.

The scene really hasn’t changed and all development towards working on higher revisions has been stopped because of the
bot update. The amount of intelligent people in RSPS has been frozen and outsourced to an internment camp somewhere. Who knows.

Uhhh, can’t think of anything else.
[/quote]
clearly incorrect, you’re still here aren’t you? :P[/quote]

Yeah but I can’t remember the last time I released a quality thread since the ones that are on the wiki. There’s nothing much to talk about anymore since no one really cares.

Research has stagnated. We don’t even have a complete packet list and I just recently released the cs’s. Fuck if anyone uses it. We’ve just hit the limit of how far people want to go.

Read full topic
